category: General Assembly of Delegates and Board of Directors Regulations/Article 7 (Opening Declaration)
contents: Article 7 (Opening Declaration) ① When the opening time arrives, the chairperson shall have the moderator check the number of attendees and report whether the quorum stipulated in Article 19 of the Articles of Incorporation has been reached. ② When the chairperson receives a report from the moderator that the quorum has been reached, he/she must declare the session open without delay. ③ After the opening declaration, the chairman may proceed with the national ceremony and give a brief opening greeting.
